document_data.name: Alanna
document_data.mainbody:
'''Alanna''' was a [[cleric]] from the [[Temple of Waukeen (Neverwinter)|Temple of Waukeen]] in [[Neverwinter]] in the late 14{{th}} century during the years that followed the [[Shadow War]].

{{quote|''Bantam! I welcome you to the Temple of Waukeen, friends. May your stay here be profitable, and the Merchant's Friend smile on your endeavors herein!''|Alanna}}
document_data.Description: Alanna was an attractive woman with red-chestnut hair. She wore her church's [[robe]]s and a [[gold]]en [[circlet]].
document_data.Personality: Alanna was a cheerful and pleasant cleric who warmly greeted visitors to the Temple of Waukeen.
document_data.History: Alanna arrived in Neverwinter with her church shortly after the [[Shadow War]] of the {{YearlinkName|1374}} by Lord [[Nasher Alagondar]]'s invitation. Once the temple opened its doors in the [[Tyr's Eye]], where the city's mages' academy once stood, Alanna worked at the front of the chapel, warmly welcoming guests and answering any questions they might've had.
